scripts.bootstrap:dev: npm run configure && npm run start:dev
scripts.configure: npm run configure:server && npm run configure:client
scripts.clean: npm run clean:root && npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.ncu: cd client && npm run ncu && cd ../server && npm run ncu
scripts.ncu:update: cd client && npm run ncu:update && cd ../server && npm run ncu:update -u
